title: Flight Simulator 2020 - MSFS Update - Velocity One  - new firmware available
description:
In this video we will look at the changes which are coming with the latest firmware release for the VelocityOne Flight Control System.  The most import fixes and new functionalities will be seen when using it in combination with the Xbox. Using this firmware in combination with Sim Update 10 (released mid September) both the chronometer and status indicator panel will also work on the Xbox. If you are participating in the beta of Sim Update 10 you can already try out this functionality.
